text: Inna yasen nnbi nnsen: "Ni$ Oebbi, s tidep, Iuzen awen d Ialut, d agellid". Nnan: "amek ara yili d agellid nne$? Nezwar it akken neklal tagelda. Ur as ippunefk wayla". Inna: "Oebbi, s tidep, Ifren it garawen, u Irna yas aias n tmusni akked loeppa". Ippak Oebbi tagelda S i win i S ihwan. Oebbi d Ajemmal, d Amusnaw
